alert.note: Alert for Union (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 5:13PM MDT until June 10 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Union County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 513 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clayton Lake State Park, or 9 miles northwest of Clayton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clayton and Clayton Lake State Park. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 416 and 429. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Boaters should take refuge at the nearest protected shoreline.
